system.description: It creates a heavily laden banquet table, with delicacies enough to have eight men gorge themselves through the evening. It is only afterwards that they realise the succulent viands were cowpies, the soup a muddy swill, the sweets horse crap, the fruits rotten mash, the Champagne wine – Heaven forfend! – horse piss, et cetera. Then, they must roll a Bravery save, or they will lie in sickbed for a week. Many have sought Tadeusz, but no matter how diligently they did, they could never find him.
